Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster and Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Foster, Clark, Bryn Mawr, Ashland, Foster, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Holland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Westbound buses will operate via 87th, State, 83rd, Vincennes, Halsted, & 87th.

Headline: #201 Central/Ridge Temporary Reroute near Howard/Winchester

Eastbound buses will operate via Howard, Ridge, Touhy and Rogers including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #97 Skokie bus to provide continued service.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
